title: Social Media Marketing Assistant (#453)
job_overview:
Are you looking for a big family where you can feel you belong? Do you want to work with a company that really cares about You? Do you want to feel safe with no office politics?

We are looking for the next SUPERSTAR for our family. A caring, well-rounded teaUpgrade to see actual infomber with drive & passion for adding value and being a part of a growing company.

Hi!! This is Lindsay!! I am the CEO and owner of Platinum & Company Beauty Bar, I also coach and mentor other salon owners across North America. I'm currently looking for an Assistant that can help me with public relations, social media, marketing, updating our website and Shopify, some help with QuickBooks, & pulling reports.

Are you…

* Proficient with Shopify, Instagram, Facebook, TikTok, QuickBooks, Envision Cloud, Canva, Trello, Slack, and YouTube
* Someone who loves to communicate with people through writing & language
* Persistent, aggressive and driven
* Excellent in communication
* Good with speaking and writing in English
* Very organized
* Very detail-oriented
* Someone who has a positive attitude
* A solution provider
* Proactive
* Able to start immediately.
* Able to work during 8 am - 5 pm CST, Monday to Friday
* Someone who has a minimum internet speed is at least 20mbps.

If this sounds like you, then you are the one we are looking for!!

Please answer the following questions now and we will reach out to you:

1. How would you define success in your personal & business life?
2. When you encountered a problem in your previous job(s), what did you do to overcome it?
3. How would you rate your organization skills from 1-10? Please explain why you feel you are organized as a person?
4. Who is the most influential person in your life and how did he/she impact you? How would they describe you?
5. What is the toughest obstacle you have encountered in life? Did you overcome it? How?
6. With the tasks and requirements mentioned above, if you are going to rate yourself from 1-10, 10 being the highest, what rate will you give yourself and why?

Thank you GREATLY for your time & we look forward to hearing from you.
